title: Prickly, the porcupine
brief_description: Designed for use in primary classes, this film presents the porcupine as a subject to stimulate class discussion, reading, and oral expression. Tells the adventures of Prickly the porcupine, when he wanders on a farm and meets the children who live there, and their dog.
